summary: Documentary look at the effects of globalization on Jamaican industry and agriculture.
cast: Belinda Becker|Buju Banton|Horst Köhler|Michael Manley|Stanley Fischer|Michael Witter|David Coore|Bill Clinton|Jean-Bertrand Aristide|Yami Bolo|Tom Lipetzky|Kathy Owen|Jerry J. Rawlings|Jamaica Kincaid
title: Life and Debt
